stories.title: Azure Infrastructure Setup
stories.description: Provision all required Azure resources: App Service, SQL Database, Blob Storage, Key Vault, Application Insights. Configure networking, firewall rules, and secrets management.
acceptanceCriteria: Azure resource group created (rg-leadintel-prod)

Export data from Replit PostgreSQL
Import data to Azure SQL and verify integrity
